message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think we can do better than that. How about we meet at $9,500?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,200.
I understand you need to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000 again, can we agree on that?

Bob, I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,100.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can we agree on that price?

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,100 and $9,500, which would be $9,800. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9,800.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $9,200, which is as close to my target as I'm willing to go. Can we agree on that price?
